blog.name: catatonyc
blog.title: as tony probably said at least once,
blog.description: cat·a·ton·ic /ˌkadəˈtänik/ (informal) of or in an immobile or unresponsive stupor. | dumb canon and non-canon tony stark quotes and content

summary:
tony: *never really says i love you but shows it in his own way*
 peter: miss potts why are there several transfers creating an...
body:
tony: *never really says i love you but shows it in his own way*

peter: miss potts why are there several transfers creating an ascii image of a spider from a bank account under the name “iron man’s favorite people fund”?

pepper: tony is very bad at expressing fondness.

pepper: he does his best, but buying me a wedding ring years before we even started dating may have come across as a little weird.

peter: miss potts why are there several transfers creating an ascii image of a spider from a bank account under the name “iron man’s favorite people fund”?

pepper: tony is very bad at expressing fondness.

blog.name: builder051
blog.title: ill-o-mania
blog.description:
•I'm Laur, an adult human. He/him.

• I write stuff, draw stuff, and review films. Original and fandom content (primarily MCU; full list here).

• Fics are hurt/comfort, angst, sickfic, illness & injury, and emeto. • Drawings are largely gen with occasional i&i or nsfw. • I take commissions and prompts for fics and art.

| Check kink status here

| See characters and fandoms here

| Film Crits are here

| Buy me a coffee here

| See master story list here

| I'm on AO3 as Builder

| Professional blog is @llcupp-author

| Personal sideblog is @my-wayward-son

| Vietnam War art sideblog is @laur-draws-war

• Chat me up if you want. I’m too shy to initiate anything, but if you get my attention, I’ll respond.

question: Peter Parker, drowning
answer:
Another anon asked for Peter Parker: Overdose, so I’m combining them.

_____

When the kid gets out of the back of Happy’s land rover and immediately trips over his feet, Tony knows something’s wrong.  He should’ve noticed when Peter slid slowly out of the car instead of bounding, but he cuts himself a little slack.  It’s not his job to know everything about the kid, even though he does anyway.

“Whoa, there.”  Tony catches Peter by the strap of his backpack and pulls him upright.  “Too much chocolate milk, or what?”

“Nah, I’m ok.  I’m good,” Peter says quickly.  His voice comes out a little thick.  He wipes his nose on his sleeve, then looks up at Tony as if to see if he noticed.  

Tony takes in the kid’s pallor and the pink flush on his cheekbones, but his focus lands on the soggy Kleenex wadded in Peter’s fist.  

“Ok, if you’re not gonna use that, you have to throw it away.”  Tony points to the garbage outside the facility’s front door.  It’s filled mostly with empty Starbucks cups and candy wrappers, fulfilling its intended purpose of keeping the junk out of the shared living room.  Tony would like to avoid collecting used tissues in a damp pile on the coffee table, too.

“What?”  Peter looks confused, then glances down at his hand. “Oh.”

“Wait, look at me again.”  Tony holds his finger up between his eyes and squints into the kid’s face.  “Please don’t take this the wrong way, but are you sick, or are you tripping?”

Peter blinks.  “Huh?”  He slowly shakes his head.  “I’m fine.  I feel…really good.”

“You’re drowning in snot, and your pupils are blown.”  Tony snags the tissue between two fingers and quickly nudges the kid under the chin with his knuckles before lobbing it into the trash.  “And you’re spiking a fever.”

“Am not,” Peter protests, clumsily crossing his arms.  “I took something for that.”

“Oh yeah?”  Tony gives him a skeptical look.  “And what kind of something was it?  Nyquil?  Dayquil?”

“…I can’t remember.”

“Right.”  Tony shakes his head.  “Remember how much?”

The kid’s shoulders slowly creep toward his ears while the redness on his cheeks spreads over the bridge of his nose..

“Ok.  You’re coming with me.”  Tony pulls him toward the front door.  He’ll assume an overdose, because when it comes to the kid, he’d rather be safe than sorry.  

“Sorry, Mr. Stark,” Peter says pitifully.

“Maybe I’ll give you a lecture about reading fine print on the back of bottles.”  Tony sighs.  “But I’ll save it for later.”

title: Exposed to the Internet
body:
Social media exposure AU

PROOF SPIDER-MAN LOVES CLICKBAIT by mauvera

When Peter Parker gets a job working at Buzzfeed there’s really only one subject he can write about: superheroes. And what superhero does he know better than everyone’s friendly neighborhood Spider-Man? What he didn’t expect was that everyone would think Peter’s new obsession with the hero would be interpreted quite like That.

Peter Parkour: The Making of a School Meme by Cryingcosmic

it starts with one video, then theres a few more. Or. How Peter became a school meme.

who gives a damn about the family you come from? by tempestaurora

It started with a harmless Instagram story on Peter’s account. Then Tony Stark reposted it. Then Peter Parker’s account blew up. Harley Keener’s there because he likes to watch the world burn. AKA the social media au we need in these trying times.

Who Added the Kid? by oh_heccity

Tony makes a group chat with the other Avengers and adds Peter in it. Chaos ensues but everyone loves Peter and has fun(?).

Spider’s Rise to Fame Online by fabulousweirdo

Peter decides it would be a fun idea to share his experiences as both Tony Stark’s personal intern and Spider-Man online for the world to see. He receives a lot more attention than he expected as both Peter Parker and Spider-Man and now has to balance keeping both platforms alive and managing his newfound fame without raising suspicion. (I will update tags as the story progresses.)

#AcaDec Squad by Hittinmiss

[Liz Allen created the group chat]
[Group Chat was renamed AcaDec Squad]
[Liz Allen added 8 new members]                                                                          —Chat fic for the academic decathlon kids in homecoming!

Spider Tweets by UngodlyDaughter

Marvel Twitter fun

President Natasha and why we stan a god by Blxckspiders

The avengers all have twitter and exclaimes their love for one another or, Peter parker is a little shit but they all love him

title: Type
body:
requested by @anunhealthydoseofangst

For Tony: I can’t believe I got the first year, or even the first date

Took a few liberties with this one. 

Tony Stark looks down at the person sleeping on his chest. He smiles, wrapping his arms around them. The silence is broken by their question, “What’re you thinking about?”

“I’m just,” Tony stop so he can gather his thoughts. “I’m just in shock and awe.” They look up at him, eyes heavy with sleep. “About what?”

“You, me, us.” They press their lips together, silent. “I can’t believe I’ve been able to spend a whole year with you,” Tony explains, “I can’t believe I even got to you first!” They chuckle, “What are you talking about?”

“Steve was going to ask you out you know.” This earns him a real laugh. “Good luck, Steve is so not my type.”

“What is your type?” They shift, putting more weight on Tony. “Oh, you know, the genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist type.” Tony’s smile feels like it’s going to rip his face in two. “Yeah, those are the best, aren’t they?”

reblog.comment:
requested by @anunhealthydoseofangst

For Tony: I can’t believe I got the first year, or even the first date

Took a few liberties with this one. 

Tony Stark looks down at the person sleeping on his chest. He smiles, wrapping his arms around them. The silence is broken by their question, “What’re you thinking about?”

“I’m just,” Tony stop so he can gather his thoughts. “I’m just in shock and awe.” They look up at him, eyes heavy with sleep. “About what?”

“You, me, us.” They press their lips together, silent. “I can’t believe I’ve been able to spend a whole year with you,” Tony explains, “I can’t believe I even got to you first!” They chuckle, “What are you talking about?”

“Steve was going to ask you out you know.” This earns him a real laugh. “Good luck, Steve is so not my type.”

“What is your type?” They shift, putting more weight on Tony. “Oh, you know, the genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist type.” Tony’s smile feels like it’s going to rip his face in two. “Yeah, those are the best, aren’t they?”

trail.content_raw:
requested by @anunhealthydoseofangst

blog.name: prosepeare
blog.title: Walking on Dreams and Stars...
blog.description: Born to be a heroine...but still in training for my great adventure. Spend a lot of time submitting to various incorrectquotes blogs. Come here for geekery, stay for insanity.

tags: because I feel like 'who's side are you on' extends to the characters
and these aren't POLITICAL PARTIES full on
seen a few 'tony as cassandra who predicted Thanos' posts recently
and the thing IS that Tony IS a hero who did what he thought was right in the long term
but  at the same time the short term had goals too
and he let his emotions and driving force of guilt motivate him
(also I think some of that guilt was 'white guilt' but that's another story)
summary: one of the nice things that I’ve realized recently is that it IS possible to be Team Cap in Civil War, have Steve Rogers be your...
body: one of the nice things that I’ve realized recently is that it IS possible to be Team Cap in Civil War, have Steve Rogers be your total fave, agree that Tony Stark has made as many mistakes as he’s fixed (or possibly more)…and still like Tony and/or recognize he’s made valid points more than a few times.

reblog.comment: one of the nice things that I’ve realized recently is that it IS possible to be Team Cap in Civil War, have Steve Rogers be your total fave, agree that Tony Stark has made as many mistakes as he’s fixed (or possibly more)…and still like Tony and/or recognize he’s made valid points more than a few times.

trail.content_raw: one of the nice things that I’ve realized recently is that it IS possible to be Team Cap in Civil War, have Steve Rogers be your total fave, agree that Tony Stark has made as many mistakes as he’s fixed (or possibly more)…and still like Tony and/or recognize he’s made valid points more than a few times.
